DOC.brief_title: A Study Topical Danazol Treatment Pain Associated With Fibrocystic Breast Disease
DOC.criteria: Menstruating female least 18 year age Has moderate severe breast pain associated cyclical fibrocystic breast disease Is good general health Pregnant within past 6 month lactate History malignancy currently treat cancer breast genital organ Has take within past 3 month currently take hormonal contraception Has condition androgen steroid contraindicate Has breast implant breast reduction surgery
